review: The doctor was looks well experienced. She was patient and explained well about the procedure to be followed up next. 👍

She is very caring and experienced doctor. She is so polite & very talented. Visited for continuous bleeding from last 2 months. She checked properly n advice us for surgery. Now after surgery, all is going well. she is very nice👌👍
The doctor was extremely polite and explained everything with patience. Highly recommended for any Gynae issues
